title: Granola, Mn: Love and War in a Nutty Little Town
description: Allison Couch has her hands full dealing with the assorted flakes, fruits and nuts in Granola. One summer morning, Toby Davenport moves to town. A young, black, Afghanistan War veteran, he has a heart of gold but a guilt-fueled addiction.Together, they take on parades, pit bull rescues, game show auditions, driving lessons, building inspectors, racism and falling in love. Heartbreaking, slapstick, and rambunctious, life never goes as planned. But thereâ€™s always hope, in Granola, Mn.
author: Susanne Aspley
